Discipline is not willpower. It is infrastructure.

A system that links cues, routines, and feedback loops creates stable behavior over time. The relationship between those parts is the argument.

When Kubrick builds atmosphere through symmetry and pacing, the world itself carries meaning before the dialogue explains anything.

In the 2019 Joe Rogan interview with Annie Jacobsen, one specific exchange reframes how people talk about secrecy in public life.

Therefore the shortest path to consistency is to design your environment, not to wait for motivation.
